shortcv.p: Olga Manou is a Doctoral Researcher and a Research Associate at the Wireless Research Center of AUEB-RC. She holds a Dipl. in Financial and Management Engineering and a MSc in Applied Economics and Finance. Her main research focus lies in the areas of the theory of digital currencies and the applications of the blockchain technology. She has worked for more than 6 years as a Business Consultant in multinational companies involved mainly, in large scale multidisciplinary projects in the IT and business development sector. (http://istlab.dmst.aueb.gr/wrc/, http://www.wirelessresearch.eu/)
